text: The X.Org Foundation is a group responsible for making the X Window System. The group was created on 22 January 2004. The X.Org Foundation is a corporation based in Delaware. It has a non-profit status. The X.Org Server is the most common implementation of X. It is used on Linux, UNIX, and Unix-like systems. It is the base technology underlying both GNOME and KDE desktops and the CDE desktop environment . ==Related pages== * X.Org Server * freedesktop.org == Other websites == *X.Org Foundation website Category:Free and open-source software organizations Category:Non-profit organizations of the United States Category:Delaware Category:2004 establishments in the United States
title: X.Org Foundation
